attributes.description:
U8085
Frank Vos Motors prides itself on providing Excellent Customer Service and we deliver Nationwide Wide. We welcome trade-ins and arrange finance through any of the Major Finance Houses in SA. Our Finance Department also offers an Extended Warranty on our vehicles which is valid for two years/ unlimited Mileage as well as various Value Added Products which is optional. All our vehicles undergo a Quality Check and Pre- delivery inspection. Price Excludes On the road Charges
